pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixtures-of-Experts Markov Chain Clustering and Dirichlet Multinomial Clustering // This package provides various Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampler for model-based clustering of discrete-valued time series obtained by observing a categorical variable with several states (in a Bayesian approach). In order to analyze group membership, we provide also an extension to the approaches by formulating a probabilistic model for the latent group indicators within the Bayesian classification rule using a multinomial logit model.
